page.title: 12Appleby Library
page.content: We have one library at Appleby.It is upstairs in the clinic.Quite a lot of people go there.You have to be very quiet in the library because people work there and find out useful imformation.At the library you can take books out and fetch them back on certain days and you can also take out magazines.They have thousands of books for your interests.Before you can get a book out you have to have a ticket and the librarian takes the ticket out of the book and she stamps a label inside it. Downstairs there is a room for old people and they have their dinner there and play dominoes and cards.They call it a day centre. There is a chiropodist but only senior citizens can go. Kerry Coward
